fields.name: ThankYou
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for participating!

RSVP for Reunion at vertoeducation.org/alumni


Nominate a student - every person that lists you you’ll get $5

fields.name: WelcomeText
fields.fieldText:
Verto Alumni - We Want to Hear from You!


Thank you for your response to the Alumni Census.


This survey should take 10 minutes to complete and will be used to inform our Alumni Engagement strategy the best support you as a Verto alumnus.


Upon completion, you will be sent a gift card for a free coffee. Our goal is to have 100% completion by March 31st - will you help us? 


Questions? Reach out to Matteo - alumni@vertoeducation.org.


﻿Thank you!
